languages.text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, когда применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, выбирая в качестве цели союзника или самого себя. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者将自己或盟友选定为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}目标时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者将自己或盟友选定为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}目标时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, когда применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, выбирая в качестве цели союзника или самого себя. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} каждый раз, когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа воздействует на союзника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется и действует до конца боя.

Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} каждый раз, когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа воздействует на союзника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется и действует до конца боя.

languages.text: 使用者は、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットに仲間または自分自身を選択するたびに、+5の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を得る。この効果は次の戦闘終了時まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットに仲間または自分自身を選択するたび、+5の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を得る。この効果は次の戦闘終了時まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: El portador obtiene +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} cada vez que elige a un aliado o a sí mismo como objetivo de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. Este efecto dura hasta el final del combate. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} cada vez que elige a un aliado o a sí mismo como objetivo de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. Este efecto dura hasta el final del combate. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, wenn er einen Verbündeten oder sich selbst als Ziel einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auswählt. Dieser Effekt dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, wenn er einen Verbündeten oder sich selbst als Ziel einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auswählt. Dieser Effekt dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Le porteur gagne un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} chaque fois qu'il prend un allié ou lui-même pour cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}. Cet effet dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} chaque fois que ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} affectent un allié. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} reste en vigueur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

Le porteur gagne un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} chaque fois qu'il prend un allié ou lui-même pour cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}. Cet effet dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilitiy{/g} targets an ally (including themself). This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilitiy{/g} targets an ally (including themself). This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} hedefi olarak kendisini veya bir dost birimi seçtiğinde +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.
